title: 650 22 "Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!"Transliteration: "Rufi to Shukumei no Ken Tōshi Rebekka" (Japanese:ルフィと宿命の剣闘士レベッカ) Masahiro Hosoda Shōji Yonemura June 22, 2014(2014-06-22) January 21, 2024
transformers_text: 650 22 Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate Rebecca Transliteration Ru fi to Shu ku mei no Ken T shi Re be kka Japanese Masahiro Ho soda Sh ji Yone mura June 22 2014 2014 06 22 January 21 2024 As Luffy leaves the ring after winning Block C of the tournament he is attacked by Cavendish Bartolomeo reveals he's a big admirer of Luffy ever since the events in Logue Town and have been following the Straw Hats exploits ever since Meanwhile Chin jao attempts to thank Luffy for restoring his head Luffy escapes and is found by Rebecca who buys him food As they hide Luffy overhears Jesus Burgess talking to his captain Blackbeard and tells the Emperor that he will not let him have Ace's devil fruit As Rebecca and Luffy talk she reveals some of her past
tf_idf_text: luffy gladiator fate rebecca transliteration shu mei ken shi kka japanese masahiro soda yone mura june january luffy leave ring win block tournament attack cavendish bartolomeo reveals hes big admirer luffy ever since event logue town follow straw hat exploit ever since meanwhile chin jao attempt thank luffy restore head luffy escape find rebecca buys food hide luffy overhear jesus burgess talk captain blackbeard tell emperor not let ace devil fruit rebecca luffy talk reveals past
